name: Detect Radiation
body:
**Traditions** arcane, divine, occult, primal
**Cast** (AA) somatic, verbal
**Duration** 10 minutes
-
You can see radiation and its intensity. This spell can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of dirt or wood, 1 feet of stone, 1 inch of common metal or a thin sheet of lead blocks it - but radiation can seep into the barriers and eventually make them radioactive - and thus visible.
-
Heightened **(5th)** The spell's duration is extended to 8 hours.
